articles.author: Compiled by Sibusiso Mjikeliso
articles.title: PICTURES | Indian cricket team officially lands in SA for summer tour
articles.description: The visiting Indian cricket team was pictured officially landing in South Africa for their summer tour beginning with the Boxing Day Test against the Proteas in Centurion.
articles.content:
South Africa
Dean Elgar (captain, Titans), Temba Bavuma (vice-captain, Lions), Quinton de Kock (wicketkeeper, Titans), Kagiso Rabada (Lions), Sarel Erwee (Dolphins), Beuran Hendricks (Western Provin… [+795 chars]

articles.author: BBC Sport
articles.title: 'Ashes at stake one day into second Test'
articles.description: There have only been five days' cricket in the Ashes, but England already face being overwhelmed by Australia, writes Stephan Shemilt.
articles.content:
It started as a dream.
For a few hours on a cold winter night, English cricket fans could have been forgiven for sleepy thoughts turning to 2005.
England had been hammered in the first Ashes Test, … [+4875 chars]

articles.title: PCB hands Umar Akmal three-year ban from all cricket | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.description: Penalty after the batsman pleaded guilty to not reporting corrupt approaches | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.content: Umar Akmal's troubled cricket career has hit its biggest roadblock yet, with the PCB handing him a ban from all representative cricket for three years after he pleaded guilty of failing to report det… [+1506 chars]

articles.title: What we learned from watching the 1992 World Cup final in full again | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.description: Wides, lbw calls, swing - plenty of things were different in white-ball cricket back then | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.content: Last week, we at ESPNcricinfo did something we have been thinking of doing for eight years now: pretend-live ball-by-ball commentary for a classic cricket match. We knew the result, yes, but we tried… [+6823 chars]
